author: l1am0
aiHeadline: Why do we need another networking tool? Because clearly, trust is at an all-time low! Introducing Netbird, the latest open-source zero trust networking solution that probably still needs a firewall.

title: Teaching my neighbor to keep the volume down
author: firefoxd
aiHeadline: Teaching my neighbor to keep the volume down: Because nothing says 'good neighbor' like a polite reminder to not blast your music at 3 AM.

title: What I learned building an opinionated and minimal coding agent
author: SatvikBeri
aiHeadline: What I learned building an opinionated and minimal coding agent: Apparently, the world needs yet another coding tool that's as opinionated as your favorite know-it-all friend.

title: Adventure Game Studio: OSS software for creating adventure games
author: doener
aiHeadline: Adventure Game Studio: Because everyone's got a would-be game developer inside them, just waiting to create the next big adventure. Or maybe just a really bad one.

title: Defeating a 40-year-old copy protection dongle
author: zdw
aiHeadline: Defeating a 40-year-old copy protection dongle: Because 40 years later, some tech is still as stubborn as ever, and someone had to prove it can be beaten.
